eager.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: very keen and excited about something that is going to happen or about something you want to do
eager.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A crowd of eager young students were already waiting outside.
I was eager to get back to work as soon as possible.
He’s a bright kid and eager to learn.
She’s a very hard worker and very eager to please.
fans eager for a glimpse of the singer
